name: Space (Game Engineer)
description:
Use the gravity changer to escape small spaces. Use the teleporters to teleport. And use the elevator to escape.
The Idea
I had a piece of paper with some words the words where "Physics, Teleport, Space".
So i got on unity and started going my brain took me to the physics.
Whats included
There is a gravity changing mechanic. There is a physics based movement system. And there are teleporters
